title: Her Bonds
description: BONDS. INTRIGUE. ROMANCE.  This is the fourth and final book of the Kindred Souls series.   Rhapsody and her kindreds are more determined than ever to take down the king and put the princess on the throne.  It will take all of them working together to save Faligrey.  And if they fail, their bonds may be broken before they can even fully form.
author: Helene Gadot
